remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  Closure of ` N ` . (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-2013.)
statement:
cdlemefr27.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemefr27.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemefr27.c $e |- C = ( ( s .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ s ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdlemefr27.n $e |- N = if ( s .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) , I , C ) $.
cdlemefr27cl $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( s e. A /\ -. s .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) /\ P =/= Q ) ) -> N e. B ) $.
